about_the_game:
Have you heard the rumor?

If you call a certain number at 1am, you will be connected to a person called the 1am operator.

This person is said to be able to connect you to the past.

Story

“The 1am Operator”

“If you call 001 at 1am, you will be connected to the 1am operator, who will connect you to the past.”

Asahi tries out this urban legend in the hope of fulfilling a certain wish. Thinking it was just a made-up story, he is surprised to find that it really does work. The woman who answers the phone, calling herself the operator, tells him that she can connect him to calls that for some reason or other have not been delivered. Asahi calls the phone, hoping to fulfill his own wish. However, the people he calls have various regrets...

A story about making phone calls and connecting people

You can dial numbers just like on a real smartphone. The operator at 1am can only make calls to numbers between 001 and 099. Try calling anywhere first. Someone may be able to tell you the number you should call. There is sure to be someone's regret waiting for you at the end of the line.

■Features

This is an adventure game where you make calls and trigger new stories.
This game contains blood and gore.
Play time is about 4 to 5 hours

■Controls

Mouse operation
Left click・・・Decision

■"Video Distribution Guidelines

Distribution is possible regardless of whether there is revenue, whether it is an individual or a corporation
We are not responsible for any damages incurred by distributing this game
These guidelines are subject to change without notice

name: 深夜1時の交換手

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Core i7 4710MQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 GPU1.15GHz 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
